sn3.4:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho raja pasenadi kosalo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn3.4:1.3: “idha mayham, bhante, rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
sn3.4:1.4: ‘kesam nu kho piyo atta, kesam appiyo atta’ti?
sn3.4:1.6: ‘ye ca kho keci kayena duccaritam caranti, vacaya duccaritam caranti, manasa duccaritam caranti;
sn3.4:1.9: “piyo no atta”ti, atha kho tesam appiyo atta’.
sn3.4:1.11: Yanhi appiyo appiyassa kareyya, tam te attanava attano karonti;
sn3.4:1.13: Ye ca kho keci kayena sucaritam caranti, vacaya sucaritam caranti, manasa sucaritam caranti;
sn3.4:1.16: ‘appiyo no atta’ti; atha kho tesam piyo atta.
sn3.4:1.18: Yanhi piyo piyassa kareyya, tam te attanava attano karonti;
sn3.4:2.2: Ye hi keci, maharaja, kayena duccaritam caranti, vacaya duccaritam caranti, manasa duccaritam caranti;
sn3.4:2.5: ‘piyo no atta’ti, atha kho tesam appiyo atta.
sn3.4:2.7: Yanhi, maharaja, appiyo appiyassa kareyya, tam te attanava attano karonti;
sn3.4:2.9: Ye ca kho keci, maharaja, kayena sucaritam caranti, vacaya sucaritam caranti, manasa sucaritam caranti;
sn3.4:2.15: Yanhi, maharaja, piyo piyassa kareyya, tam te attanava attano karonti;
